component.description: Focus is a handy component that makes it easy to manage the element focus on a JSF page.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: for
attribute.description: Specifies the exact component to set focus.

attribute.name: context
attribute.description: The root component to start first input search.

attribute.name: minSeverity
attribute.description: Minimum severity level to be used when finding the first invalid component.
